name: Eduardo Ribeiro
description: I am a 4th year Software Engineering student from Porto, with great passion for programming/software developing, artificial intelligence, algorithms, distributed systems and just software engineering as a whole. I have grown to be a proactive person that always seeks to have initiative and to keep learning about my interests, even outside of college. Moreover, I am also a big fan of sports, mainly football, tennis and basketball. Other hobbies include chess, gaming, and exercising.
